Reviews.Title: “A rocky start, but turned out just fine”
Reviews.Author: Shannon1986
Reviews.Content: firstly speaks english hostel fine italy makes difficult goes wrong booked reservation online 2 days arrived midnight didnt reservation 2 printed confirmation morning lady shouting reservation 3 times finally downstairs email stood shoulder time email inbox saying found confirmation email printed didnt calm told change half hour completely changed attitude offered breakfast cappucinos told venice bus forgave yelling actually enjoyed rest stay nice nodding smiling dont speak english care hostel actually marghera short bus ride venice 6 runs hostel past midnight venice accessible walking water bus overall fine stay venice

HotelInfo.Name: Al Piccolo Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Via Trieste, 2/h, 30175 Venice, Italy
